subtitle: description
body: The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality applications.
They will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable code.

subtitle: Responsibilities
body: Develop quality software and web applications.
Analyze and maintain existing software applications.

subtitle: Qualifications
body: ·        Must have a degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field.
·        3+ years of proficiency in advanced C++ and object-oriented design methodologies.
·        Nice To Have Proficiency in SystemC and ESL modeling.
·        Knowledge of ARM microprocessor architecture and CPU behavior Experience with scripting languages e.
·        Strong analytical problem solving skills, innovative thinking, and a mindset of continuous improvement.
·        Effective verbal and written communication skills.

subtitle: About HCL
body: At HCL, we don’t just accept the differences—we support it and celebrate it.
We are committed to cultivating and preserving a culture of inclusion and connectedness.
We are able to grow and learn better together with a diverse team of employees.
As an equal opportunity employer, we stay true to our mission by ensuring that our place can be anyone’s place.
